info.title: FCA
info.description: The online Financial Services Register is a public record of financial services firms, individuals and other bodies regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA)

URL.description: API to fetch the detail record of the data
URL.title: URL

Reference Number.description: The Unique number of the record
Reference Number.title: Reference Number

Type of business or Individual.description: The type of data returned. Example, Firm, Individual, Collective Investment Scheme
Type of business or Individual.title: Type of business or Individual

Name.description: The name of the firm or individual
Name.title: Name

get.description: Gets the search results for Individuals, Firms or Collective Investment Schemes

page.description: The page number of the request, when the data returned is in page, it returns the current page. For account details, it will be 1
page.title: page

per_page.description: The number of records returned per page
per_page.title: per_page

total_count.description: The total number of records returned by the request. For firm details it will be only 1
total_count.title: total_count

Disciplinary History.description: URL to fetch the Disciplinary History
Disciplinary History.title: Disciplinary History

Roles & Activities.description: URL to fetch all the roles of an individual
Roles & Activities.title: Roles & Activities

Commonly Used Name.description: Commonly used names of the individual
Commonly Used Name.title: Commonly Used Name

Firm Name.description: The firm name of an individual’s workplace(s) displayed at the town/city line of the address where holding a customer-facing role
Firm Name.title: Firm Name

Location 1.description: The geographical location of an individual’s workplace(s) displayed at the town/city line of the address where holding a customer-facing role
Location 1.title: Location 1

Address.title: Address

Waivers.description: URL to fetch the associated waivers of the firm
